long_description: Available in 2 sizes, the Nite Ize KnotBone Bungee cord is an adjustable bungee cord with carabiner clips on the ends for added versatility and security. Ends have carabiner clips instead of hooks giving you more options for securing items onto pack, bike or kayak. Once adjusted, bungee ends can be secured in place with a wrap-and-lock motion around end of carabiner. Instead of elastic that loses its stretch over time, KnotBone has a durable, high quality cord that threads through each end. Size 5mm bungee adjusts from 10 to 48 inches; size 9mm bungee adjusts from 6 to 28 inches.
short_description: Available in 2 sizes, the Nite Ize KnotBone Bungee cord is an adjustable bungee cord with carabiner clips on the ends for added versatility and security.
